inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: guidelines of the American Academy of Pediatrics

inclusion.criterion: Parents are required to sign informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of pemphigus, scalded skin or burns that make phototherapy difficult
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient who requires transfer for management in another institution by their health insurer
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 22-year-old Caucasian man with tremors, Kayser-Fleischer' ring, jaundice, hepatosplenomegaly and hypotonia. Confirmed Wilson disease diagnosis.
